attributes.action:
I demand the Government pays for security for the Remembrance Day
Marches 2017.
attributes.additional_details: I would hope this is not a Political ploy on behalf of the Police Federations, and I also hope this will be stringently reviewed and investigated to who came up with this suggestion
attributes.background: In the newspaper today, the Police are refusing to be at the Marches nationwide for security, due to Government cuts. This is an absolute disgrace and it HAS to be negotiated that funds are available out of the Foreign Aid Account, as these gallant soldiers died on Foreign Soil. "Lest we forget"
